channel.title: Wordpress on Itarow

item.title: Hackthebox - Spectra - Write up
item.description: I rooted Spectra which was an Easy Other type machine. This box was cool, it implicates malicious plugin upload on WordPress, credentials find on “/etc/autologin/passwd” and sudo capabilities on “initctl”. User So, classic nmap scan : ➜ Spectra nmap -A -p- -T4 10.10.10.229 Starting Nmap 7.70 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2021-03-29 09:11 CEST Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.229 Host is up (0.073s latency). Not shown: 65532 closed ports PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 8.
